Class Formula

  • java.lang.Object
    • csheets.core.formula.Formula
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Expression, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestCase

    public class Formula
extends Object
implements Expression
    A formula in a cell.
    Author:
    Einar Pehrson
